title: Ranked 5's Team Silver 4  [Power] Recruitment.
body:
Looking for active and silver to gold players to fill positions consisting of adc/supp/top lane, relatively good at the game and have skype for communicating.
Plan to get to gold before the season ends, however we have had many inactive players in the past.
Skype is Iamsinister_mc 
We will have tryouts using ARAM 1v1 against myself or 2V2 if you main support ARAM aswell.
Players so far are: SLNISTER (Fill), Zasdd (mid) Synchro (jg only).
SLNISTER{{champion:62}}  - Gold 4, Zasdd -{{champion:101}}  Silver 4 (xerath main, Plays like a gold), Synchro{{champion:421}}  (silver 3. only plays jungle)

replies.body: fuck u with a {{item:1026}}
ty

IGN: Tung
Age: 19
Current Rank: D4
Role: Mid / Top / Jg
Thanks for applying, we're still doing tryouts so add me on skype @Iamsinister_mc and we'll go from there :)

Hi, I am an ADC main that is currently looking for a full time team. I am available every day at any time except for Saturday morning. 
I can play every ADC and have ample experience on them. I am currently maining Vayne, Jinx, Kalista. 
I am currently Silver 1 and climbing. 
I would very much like to play on your team.
Thanks for considering my application.

No problem, thanks for applying :), now the ranked team is still looking for people, we've given 1 member a permanent spot still working on the rest add me on skype @Iamsinister_mc (skype is our main communication tool) State your strengths, weaknesses, strategies/main champions when you add me. Thanks :)
plat 3 support/jungle here if u need me in game name is rocka

Sounds good if you want to join, add me on skype @ Iamsinister_mc, we're looking for support/jungler if our other members are away :)
or add me in game @ SLNISTER, Just state your strengths, weaknesses, strategies/main champions.
Hey I main support but can play other lanes relatively well and im wondering if there is an age barrier since i am 15?

> [{quoted}](name=DarkDerma,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=MjaB3Oza,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-08-16T06:39:37.855+0000)
>
> Hey I main support but can play other lanes relatively well and im wondering if there is an age barrier since i am 15?

As long as you can play the game relatively well and work well together. Age isn't a problem.
add me @ Iamsinister_mc on skype (Must have skype)1

I haven skype and i can play the game really well (I like to believe) but I don't think I would shot call as much or talk alot since i am what you lot refer to as a "squeaker" so yeah ill add you on skype  and in-game

hey,

I main ADC only, have another team that I run currently S1, looking for a secodn team to join, I main Jinx but can play almost every adc, i also play alot of Siv and kali

> [{quoted}](name=xAerOx,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=MjaB3Oza,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2015-08-17T00:08:58.665+0000)
>
> hey,
> 
> I main ADC only, have another team that I run currently S1, looking for a secodn team to join, I main Jinx but can play almost every adc, i also play alot of Siv and kali

Sounds good if you're active and able to play, Add Iamsinister_mc on skype for more details{{item:3060}}
IGN hashashin im pretty active and willing to play adc or top for the team so add me if interested

> [{quoted}](name=Hashshashin,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=MjaB3Oza,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-08-16T09:19:04.265+0000)
>
> IGN hashashin im pretty active and willing to play adc or top for the team so add me if interested

Cool, if you're active and everything add on skype @ Iamsinister_mc or in game @ SLNISTER
let me  know when you guys want to 5v5 ;)

> [{quoted}](name=MrBongHD,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=MjaB3Oza,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2015-08-16T09:32:33.493+0000)
>
> Kappa let me  know when you guys want to 5v5 ;)

keen ;)
bronze 3 too low?

as long as you're dedicated and won't quit halfway through i could mentor you.
we'll have 1v1's to test your skill level aswell.
I'll make an exception since this is new.
Add me on skype @ Iamsinister_mc
yeah i'm dedicated. I was in some teams previously but we never played a single game because nobody was on. what time would games be played?

> [{quoted}](name=UnholyDemigod,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=MjaB3Oza,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2015-08-16T06:51:17.370+0000)
>
> yeah i'm dedicated. I was in some teams previously but we never played a single game because nobody was on. what time would games be played?

Whenever everyone is online, but as i stated before, we're going to have to do some tryouts to determine your skill level.
Add me on skype or in game @ Iamsinister_mc Or SLNISTER
I'm keen to play. I main top lane, add me in game if you're interested.
sounds good, Add me on skype if you want to try out.

Currently can play supp well. I can play on every Sunday morning Est. I can play nami and Leona looking to pick up soraka.
IGN: Chowlet

Awesome, add me on skype @ Iamsinister_mc,
Sounds good with nami and leona, msg me when you want to 1v1 so we can test your skill level.
